<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc0000>Kohaku didn&#39;t look much younger than Batsu, wondering just what he meant by feeling out of place. The statement about passing though the academy would resonate with him though, he&#39;d already expected the academy to be something he could easily maintain as his parents had made him study for as long as he could remember.

<font color = white>&#34;Pleasure to meet you Kohaku and yes... We will indeed exceed in this years academy.&#34;</font> he said, smirking.<br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=479d53a6157a9e1a0cf6b71f58c22a0abdbdcdecd92df15464c38cd1ec506fb7 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc0000;">Uchiha, Batsu</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=6c45b554595b38848e92e2ca108f26dee1733d0e3caeeda146195d17bde977de style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Hatake, Raihara</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> But there are so many.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Well, I can introduce you to a few.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc66ff><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=a74410993ad7da70127401a532b59123e6f182f7613dfe7f74684a03d14c6143 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc66ff;">The high-toned girl</a> scoffed at the declaration that he&#39;d beat herself and the other one. So, she did what anyone else in her position would. Push his buttons even harder.

<font color = white>&#34;Hm... I&#39;ll just verbally agree to beat you then, I wouldn&#39;t want to touch your hand...&#34;</font> Her nose upturns just a tad, as though she would have caught something being too close to him.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> stepped up to Kohaku and put his fists on his hips as he stared intently at the Uchiha trio just... breathing... waiting.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=6c45b554595b38848e92e2ca108f26dee1733d0e3caeeda146195d17bde977de style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Hatake, Raihara</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Already making friends?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> OOCs<font color = white>: (dont mind my fists on your hips)</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#5a5a8c><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=0cffdd18de5c8680e368289f9bdf398f3cdddf405696c9e6a00949f77b717dd4 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #5a5a8c;">The late bloomer</a> Being quite content with keeping to himself, the last thing he anticipated was someone waltzing up to strike a conversation. After all, given the circumstances, he figured most folks around were probably younger than him. It was a tough pill to swallow, being on the older side yet perched on such a low position of the shinobi ladder.

Still, he managed to conjure up a sheepish grin in return, refusing to let rudeness take over. <font color = white>&#34;Kaoru.&#34;</font> He replied, giving a brief introduction..</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> attempts to take a step forth, as he was the first one who answered a question. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000d2];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">The platinum blonde girl</a> takes a bold step foward.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#993a33><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=a3bbc993a493a9aa0d8b00d5632878d441b2d78e7dd2f8005582507da0962fd2 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #993a33;">The solemn youngster</a> Runs up to the mountain and limbers up for a moment getting ready. Wasting no time he jumps up upon the side of the mountain and grabs onto the rocks. A quick glance was given to those who stepped up as well, some girl with white hair and a kid who's name was...Try? That didn't matter, now was not the time to get distracted.

focusing back onto the rock he'd start his climb, his first real moment of the academy. determined not to make a fool of himself the young man doesn't focus on being fast or first, but on consistency. Maybe he wouldn't get to the top first, but he was damn sure going to get there.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=efbb90debf675247e7069bc25ab495660fed353e09904713152a14500624d9bb style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">The bloodhungry samurai</a> pointed at the mountain.

- <font color = white>&#34;All I have to do is beat it up, right?&#34;</font>

Momoko instead moved back and walked to the nearest lake, kneeling close to it, getting a handfull of water and splashing it across her face. She got up, dusted herself off, took her sandals off, set them aside, and looked right back up at the TALL mountain.

Momoko held her fists back, and started to accumulate momentum. . .

Beginning to utilize the infamous Super Peel Out, Trademarked, catching up with speed and boosting at high-mach towards the Mountain! Her hand shot back,

dramatically reaching out towards the rock, with a blitz effect covering up her POV, flames erupting out of her fingertips, GRIPPING on one rock-hard surface!

Momoko started to punch the mountain&#39;s walls, beginning to climb at a ridiculously fast pace, surpassin-

no, wait, she hasn&#39;t even gotten one meter above the ground. Momoko is scratching the surface at comically high speeds and going nowhere, because physics decided they&#39;d specifically fuck her over.

She looks like a feral cat trying to get over some curtains.</font></font></font>

It looks more like a plateau. How in the world is he going to do this? And more importantly- How is he going to get the others up there as well? 

He watched as everyone grappled with their own approaches, attempting various methods to conquer the vertical terrain. And then, as if a puzzle piece snapping into place, an idea took shape in his mind. He rubbed his chin thoughtfully, the cogs of his mind whirring.

<font color = white>&#34;Hmmm. . .&#34;</font> He mused aloud. A lightbulb flickered above his head as an idea finally kicked in, he projected his voice even louder.

<font color = white>&#34;Alright, folks!&#34;</font> His tone raised, hoping that everyone would heed his words.

<font color = white>&#34;Let&#39;s take turns giving each other a boost, and then use the human chain we create to pull up the stragglers. We&#39;ll make it together that way.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

The pale student moves himself back, as close to the water as he can manage without risk of slipping and falling in before suddenly charging forward.

With the running start he will draw closer to his sister before anticipating where she holds the flats of her palm, awaiting the leverage to send him skyward with a press of the foot.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>With utmost confidence, Shishorama stands tall and unwavering before the formidable mountain. She flexes her fingers, producing a satisfying crackling sound, and rotates her neck to loosen any tension before taking a determined step forward. Despite being presented with a daunting task, she took it upon herself to undergo it. 

Shisho charges towards the towering rock formation. As she approaches, she reaches out to touch its rugged surface, feeling the rough texture under her fingertips. Though the task seems daunting, with nothing but her own strength and unwavering resolve, she sets out to climb it, determined to conquer the daunting challenge.

With a steady pace and an unwavering smile, she ascends the mountain, pushing herself to her natural limits. The sweat on her face and the strain in her muscles are clear signs of the effort she is putting into the climb. Nevertheless, she refuses to be defeated by the physical toll and makes her way to the top.

<font color = white>&#34;ARGGHHHHH!&#34;</font> The intense young woman <b>ROARS</b> at the top of her lungs once the pinnacle had been reached, claiming her victory among the students that remained at the bottom of the rocky formation.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Akiri, Komo</a> stared at the bloodly samurai that just snapped a branch from the tree. She points to the ground before speaking.

<font color = white>&#34;If ya&#39;ll get hurt or something, just use nature&#39;s bandaid. Rub some dirt on it.&#34;</font>

She said, as she examined the other groups. Some were trying to work together, not a bad plan. Probably the most easiest way to complete a task, however it depends on the core strengths of the members for it to be a success.
  Komo would step her way around the groups of academy students, plugging her ears when she made her way by the Intense Senju, watching him head to the top of the mountain.

  Clan strength was truly something else...

She watched as others adopted the samurai&#39;s tactics, using their surroundings to climb such a object.

<font color = white>&#34;Resourceful.&#34;</font>

</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#666699"><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=0cffdd18de5c8680e368289f9bdf398f3cdddf405696c9e6a00949f77b717dd4 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #666699;">Kaoru</a> says:</b><span style="color:#666699"><font color = white> Either role works, just that I&#39;ll be counting on the physically strongest to reel in the rest.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600>Although the Uchiha hand't found a good spot to continue to climbing, he managed to see one just out of reach. He had an idea of what to do and wanting to show himself capable, he tried to get to it straight away...but... there was some hesitation as he would need to jump and be airborne for a moment, if he missed, he was screwed.

The fall wasn't THAT great though, so with his heart speeding up, he took a deep breath and made a leap, hands shooting forward eagerly, almost desperately for the crevice that would allow him to continue on.

Afterwards, he had to take a few deep breaths to calm down and continued on! Now he wasn't as a fraid as before, and just as he was about to reach the top, he heard Shishorama's screams of excitement.

He was just a bit too late for it. Well, next time!<br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Uchiha, Yuuto</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The wandering child</a> looked up towards the cliffside with a gulp.

<font color = white>&#34;Oh wow.&#34;</font> he says softly, tugging at his collar. They&#39;d look around to the others, looking for reactions perhaps. He had hoped to see others as worried as he was, hoping to not seem TOO out of place with his fear of heights.

<font color = white>&#34;O-okay!&#34;</font> he said, marching towards the mountain now. He studied the rock&#39;s face with intensity, planning his way before actually even trying. They saw nooks and crannies that would potentially fit his hands and feet. After awhile of putting together a strategy, he&#39;d move!

One hand stretched up first, his foot following after as it placed itself in a crack along the rocks. Not even ten feet up he&#39;d look down, eyes becoming wide as he saw the ground below.

<font color = white>&#34;O-oh...&#34;</font> he sighed, looking back up now. contiuing the climb with a slow pace. He wouldn&#39;t rush it, just knowing he only had to reach the top and wasn&#39;t asked to do so with haste. Finally, he would grasp a hand on the top of the cliff, pulling himself up to the top shakily. 

<font color = white>&#34;I-I did it!&#34;</font> he&#39;d roar, looking down the cliffside before fainting, falling on his backside from the fear it had induced!</font></font></font>

Despite this being labeled as official training it was nothing new to the young kid. He had spent many days in the past running around the village and climbing to places he probably shouldn&#39;t have.

Reaching out with his hand and pushing up with his legs, a boundless stamina allowed the kid to continue up the mountain with little trouble, it was only about passing the halfway point did he hear Shishorama yell out....damn she had beaten him. Oh well, it didn&#39;t matter.

Her pole finds the sandy ground of the river bank and lets her careen forward. Deftly, she jumped from it, and one small arm found itself reaching.

She grabbed at his wrist, thudding into the mountain harshly. 

That should have hurt, but she didn't make a sound. Moments later, she's found herself some footholds, and they've got a signfiicant headstart on the mountain.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#666699><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=0cffdd18de5c8680e368289f9bdf398f3cdddf405696c9e6a00949f77b717dd4 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #666699;">Kaoru</a> put his plan into motion. Leaning his back against the wall and adopting a squatting stance, he formed his hands into a makeshift platform, ready to serve as a human springboard. This would give the more physically capable members, the Samurai and the Youth a chance to utilize their strength not just to gain height, but also to secure a grip on a ledge, providing a sturdy foundation for their climb.

If the pieces fell into place as hoped, the Samurai and the Youth would lift him up next, a sequence that would repeat as they ascended. His own role came next  using his position as a link, connecting the chain formed by the others. Depending on their willingness and ability, either the Youth or the Samurai could be the anchor and hook.

He acknowledged that not everyone would be on the same wavelength as him, so he proceeded with those who were on the same page. His personal charisma might influence some, but he understood its limits.</font></font></font>

Shun&#39;Ichi shot his sister a scathing glare, mouthing inaudibly an <i>I&#39;ll do it myself</i> in her general direction before taking a glance to the mountain.

Three problems would arise, well--two and a half problems. First, there&#39;s no chance he&#39;s proficient enough to climb the mountain with these heavy clothes, and he doesn&#39;t have spares to replace them with--so no chance in a quick change.
Second: Komo&#39;s sword being flowed with some sort of chakra, being completely unaware of how chakra functions, the punk&#39;s simply going to have to go through with counteracting that... Somehow. 
He spits in his hands, rubbing the saliva together in order to produce an adequate amount of friction for the rough mountain walls to feel less abrase. In any case, the half problem comes to what Komo&#39;ll do if he&#39;s successful.

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> dug his palms into the mountain, feeling a rush of wind coming from the Kaguya duo gave him an idea... Besides, given the amount of people congregating about, he can properly formulate a distraction adequate enough for him to compensate for his sister&#39;s lack of support.

He quips to himself on how quickly he darts, gaining a sense of confidence in his plan, he watches Komo&#39;s weapon as if it were prey, greediness hinted throughout his eyes, before he knew it, he was directly underneath the solemn youngster, accidentally grabbing ahold of the character&#39;s leg and losing some balance.

No point in doing nothing while he was being hoisted into the air... One mountain side scale lead to another as he just looked down from above.

<font color = white>&#34;I wonder how i would&#39;ve got up her without much climbing experience...&#34;</font> As he would eventually wonder how to help the others, <font color = white>&#34;Now how do I help them make their ways up here...&#34;</font> This would be easier wwith rope, maybe holding out his hand to help peole over the edge would be enough?</font></font></font>

There&#39;s no preservation of momentum, though that may have been easier. What followed was an almost impossible display core strength. Her legs remain hooked over the rock as if two heavy weights.  There&#39;s a look of focus and strain on her face as she used the power of her core to swing him back and forth, building up power with every sway until she&#39;s nearly teetering off her perch...

And then he&#39;s hurled skyward. As she freed him, she used this same momentum to mount the cropping she had wrapped herself around and jump to the next platform.

<font color = white>&#34;Watch out!&#34;</font> She called, to anyone who might be in the way of her flying brother.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b02f2f><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=efbb90debf675247e7069bc25ab495660fed353e09904713152a14500624d9bb style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b02f2f;">Momoko</a> caught the Bushy Dweeb with one single grasp, firmly holding him with little to no difficulty. <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Okay okay... I&#39;ll be your lackey for three days if I fail! How&#39;s that sound?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> turned and reached up on the cliff face for any sort of hand hold that would bare his weight even as he slid the fishing rod over his shoulder. He then took a step up, digging the toe of his sandal into the stone face and turning his foot so that he had more surface touching. With a hop he reached another hand-hold and began the systematic climbing of the cliff. He was warmed up now but he was also a little fatigued, so this was just as hard, if not harder, than the first level, and the stakes were much higher. 

Slowly, but surely he worked his way up to the next level. The distance was farther than before but the group was counting on him. Shishorama even cheered for him and let him make the climb first! She trusted him!

The youth winced and hissed as his forearms started to cramp up and his hands went numb with charlie horses but he continued on, stopping only to shake his hands when he felt confident he could hold himself up.

Once Try weakly pulled himself over the top he laid flat on his stomach and took big, gasping breaths for air.

A long moment later the fishing line and scarf were lowered down to the chill boy.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#4a6969><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> doesn't grab her on the way up, no. She had been fired off with much too much force to try and slow her down. He could only watch as the pale girl shoots up and over him, to which he turns and waddles in place, determining where she would fall.

Her lightness worked to his advantage in this department. It was very simple to ease her falling into a simple motion, swinging himself around with the excess inertia and planting her firmly on the rocky, cliffside ground.

<font color = white>&#34;CatchmeCatchmeCatchme--!&#34;</font>

Well, assuming that Komo won&#39;t allow him to even consider grabbing the staff unless he gets through the &#39;&#39;<i>teamwork</i>&#39;&#39; bit, he inhales sharply, calling out to the two siblings.

<font color = white>&#34;Hey! I&#39;m coming up after yah!&#34;</font> The Boy unveils his scarves, placing rocks between them to form a sling, he spins the scarves about before launching them up, <font color = white>&#34;Grab &#39;em and dig em into the wall!!&#34;</font> He commands, he wasn&#39;t able to gauge their prowess, but judging from the fact that they&#39;re up there and he&#39;s down here, it&#39;s a well aligned gamble.

<font color = white>&#34;Maybe these clothes weren&#39;t a bad choice...&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The wandering child</a> nodded before removing the fishing rod from his back.

<font color = white>&#34;Alright, I&#39;ll cast down then.&#34;</font> he says before pulling the rod back, throwing it forwards to cast the line down the wall!

A nod was offered to the pair then, even if she had to lean over the edge a bit to show her gratitude to Yuuto.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> seemed entirely unafraid of zooming right into being tossed several meters into the air. <font color = white>&#34;Oh, wow. I made it! Thanks!&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;<i>O-kaaaay</i>, reel me up!&#34;</font>

<font color = white>&#34;Huh... This is pretty smart... If the fishing line holds, that is.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#468ca3><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">The wandering child</a> began tugging back on the rod with EVERYTHING he had.

<font color = white>&#34;Lets do this!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> rolled his eyes, abjuring to their remarks. Though, it seemed they in fact weren&#39;t on the strong suit, food for thought he supposed.

There was an advantage to this feat, however; Shun&#39;Ichi was going to do something unorthodox to his experience: he was attempting to mimick Komo&#39;s Body Flicker, albeit with only the process of controlling chakra.

Assuming the lady wouldn&#39;t simply show him again, Shun&#39;Ichi improvised.
He remembers reading a bit on the tiger seal; the de-facto sign to focus chakra within the human body; Shinobi works was more his sister&#39;s talent, however the prospect of chakra control always intruigued him.
Time to display that feat in full flux; with his feet upon the wall and the centre of balance upon his heart--Shun&#39;Ichi placed his index and middle fingers on each hand together, and closed his eyes.
Five seconds pass, he recognizes a spark of energy within his belly, chakra.
Ten seconds now, each second is taken spreading chakra throughout his body, before sending it primarily to his legs.
Five more seconds, he feels a sensation unfamiliar to his physical body; and it provides slack for his heart, the chakra to his feet seem to be stitching him to the mountain.

Shun&#39;Ichi wastes zero time, he rushed up the mountain all the way to a point just short of the peak, he shifts around glncing at the Chuunin once more.
<font color = white>&#34;Still think I&#39;m not up to par yet?!&#34;</font> He goads, though while doing so, he recognizes a fault in his prowess: <i>Reserve.</i>

Immediately the boy scrambles his hands onto the wall, realizing how much strain he&#39;s just placed on his body with that simple feat. He&#39;s in a huff, relying on his own desperation and the Kaguya duo&#39;s willingness to hang on to remain.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Aa--Aaughh, these rocks are a little scrape-ish!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> But I&#39;m fine!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> assumed Chakra was common knowledge and not just horded clan knowledge, taught to their offspring. <br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> pulled, trying to work in sync with the other four members of his moving squad. They had done the hard work getting up there manually and now some ingenuity would help with the others.

He groaned as Hanako let them reel her up without her own help. He was expecting the people to climb up as well, but with two lines it should have been possible.</font></font></font>

It simply hadn&#39;t occurred to her that climbing along was an option! Despite enduring bumps and shoving away from the wall where she could to avoid injury!
 
<font color = white>&#34;Don&#39;t act like a fish! Got it! I&#39;ll be as land-creature as I can be! Uh-- my hands get pruny in water, gah, I hate that!&#34;</font> 

How was she so heavy? Well-- she was drenched from, again, going through the river twice to get here! 

<font color = white>&#34;Wait--&#34;</font>

Ah. Finally someone said it out loud. <font color = white>&#34;I&#39;m supposed to climb? Ohh...&#34;</font>

She found a nice little set of edges to hook her fingers and sandal-tip onto and started to support some of her own weight along the way. <font color = white>&#34;Ah, hey. It&#39;s a little faster this way. You&#39;re really smart, handstand guy!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Uchiha, Yuuto</a> sighed.. damn, that was a lot of energy he put into this. Looking up, he could feel his muscles starting to cry as he would need to get back up again. He had the stamina to help so many people, but even so, he hadn&#39;t thought this through on needing to go back up.

Well, that was his duty... and so, he starts climbing back up, holding back cusses every step of the way, but the time he reached the ledge, he was already extending his hand to Shishomaru. <font color = white>&#34;Need some help...&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000c4];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Akiri, Komo</a> scratched her head as the scarfed boy declared his ambitions. She indeed saw some potential in the boy&#39;s chakra control, however potential is just that... Potential.

<font color = white>&#34;Nope.&#34;</font> A single word was said, before she looked over towards the others still working.

She would look around at the class of students, seeing most at the top. She folded her arms on top of her vest as a breath squeaked passed her teeth.

<font color = white>&#34;I see that most of you understood the exercise. A lesson as well as a workout to go along with it. So, lets call it a day right now.

Tomorrow, we&#39;ll work on your mental strengths to go with your physical strength. This is the beginning of Chakra. Now climb down and rest up tomorrow. You all are gonna need it for what comes next.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;And can probably wear you out before you knock me out... <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> My parents wouldn&#39;t!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> We learned how to use pulleys and, uh, throw each other. </font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Skills we will need in the future for sure.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> ...Doubtfully.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>Senju, Shishorama randomly chimes into the conversation and fades back out.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> manages to hoist himself up after a few moments, with a few winces here and there. The fat had been extra fat, after all.

He&#39;s immediately twisting his shirt, trying to get extra moisture out of it until he glances at Hanako with a quizzical expression.

<font color = white>&#34;You mind lending me your towel?&#34;</font> He asks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Well...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I had fun.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> tilted her head. 

<font color = white>&#34;Huh? Just air dry. It only takes a minute.&#34;</font> 
She said it as if it were common sense. </font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ff6600><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=fc7155ee74ec59d4c9b2e62be6a302c8489e8cb0693f8602fa3daed4d2f131e5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ff6600;">Uchiha, Yuuto</a> watches the dancer and the punk's interaction with some interest for now, at the very least hoping that there wouldn't be any violence among classmates. Unsure if it happened already since it was out of his sight before.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> There&#39;s something about being sore from hard exercise that just feels good.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ..</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> I really feel like I accomplished something.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Er. Hard exercise?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Yeah. Scaling the cliffs.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> stomped a loose rock, sending a shower of pebbles down on Shun'ichi, his latest words only inflaming her scorn. She wheeled around on her brother, and weighed the pro's and cons of striking him, too. Her blood was boiling with the characteristic lust of her heritage...

They were lucky she was tired from climbing the rocks.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> Ah.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> whispers faintly.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> side-eyes Hanako.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> stares down at his completely drenched self.

He waits approximately sixty seconds, before he glances up at her.

<font color = white>&#34;It&#39;s not happening. Did you...?&#34;</font> 

A brow quirks.

Bizarre!</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> did not speak further on the topic, her lips just pressed together in a thin line.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#12745f"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> says:</b><span style="color:#12745f"><font color = white> Oww owwwiwowwowowowow...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> was also questioning what he said, didn&#39;t he just comment on how they were siblings? Then she snatched him up in some weird sort of way, then he turned to Try.

<font color = white>&#34;You should&#39;ve been here to lift the fat kid that made my rib cage concave.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> I don&#39;t believe she has a towel.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Ah, sorry Kohaku.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Next time! </font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#12745f><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=05710d2f56464177168085caf60c9d3bc4c5fa5f94dad09ef1b837fa37c11718 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #12745f;">The punk with twin scarves</a> although the rocks weren't large enough to cause massive damage, it roughed his tender child skin quite up.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> Hopefully, we failed terribly.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> &#39;s clothing was in the active process of having moisture osmosised away. Formerly dark spots regained their natural color. Almost as if sponged away. 

<font color = white>&#34;Oh, yeah. That too! No towel. Just air dry.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc3300"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc3300"><font color = white> ...</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#4a6969><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=b50c547b25a3147f6ec374147486b4aa8928ded90c2d4fbedcfe690c644a296f style = "text-decoration: none; color: #4a6969;">The pale, red-eyed acrobat</a> smiles, amused at the anger, and the pain from Shun&#39;Ichi. <font color = white>&#34;You two are good together.&#34;</font> It&#39;s funny.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#009966><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> pulled his clothes back on.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> ... why are you still so soggy?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> That confirms my suspicion, Hanako.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc3300>Now, he was interested.

He stood there, drenched, while she was already dry. This was clearly strange. Were his eyes playing tricks on him?

He raises a hand to pat her shoulder a few times, before he attempts to gently pinch her cheek...!

<font color = white>&#34;No way.&#34;</font><br>(<a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=31308b12178e01b4d8e92c348dcba8b9d9a27b98ab9a47cc606f9f56214150cd style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc3300;">Kibo, Hajime</a>)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Oh, right. Thanks for pulling me up, Guy!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> Hm...?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ffcc00"><font color = white> ...You indeed have a strange thing with water.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#009966"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=61c2e56dbcde3b1b2e8722c6686c1381f7b4a4d48e5247b0c8ac74caf77f6b74 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #009966;">Might, Try</a> says:</b><span style="color:#009966"><font color = white> It&#39;s ah, Try, actually.</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ffcc00><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c03764ddd1ff26de0da5d225367ff9a7642261d38b84016ccd5e51f2c0a65638 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ffcc00;">The gloomy eccentric</a> snorted, and raised a hand to mask away her smile.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> You Might Try!</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">The aloof, white-haired dancer</a> turned back to the rocks and slid down them next to the boy. <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> says:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> This is why I failed language class.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#ceb773"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#ceb773"><font color = white> Isn&#39;t it?</font></font></font></span></span>

<font color = white>&#34;What about the family tradition..? Seems this was a glimpse of the Uchiha extreme high standards.

Oh no. He felt for Yuuto, he really did. Though he can&#39;t imagine that sort of outcast status, he had no words for a moment... only a long gaze of concern before nodding.

<font color = white>&#34;I-I see, living in the cold shoulder status... That&#39;s the worst, I&#39;d take up Taijutsu and Shurikenjutsu simply to stay away from the tension...

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#468ca3"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=f61a8a99ebea0ae5eb4c51eff20f4e2e71d5611c015e0483034fed646d017940 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #468ca3;">Sarutobi, Yakeru</a> says:</b><span style="color:#468ca3"><font color = white> Happy to meet y-you, Sakuya.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#d2d27d><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=c391465fd1a6d84e5c0a4aa8d4a4d143254d5a9ab9cb11e3c36c94d3761bcad5 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #d2d27d;">Fugetsu</a> continues to watch the ongoing sparring exchange. Punch was returned with a punch. Blow for blow. <font color = white>&#34;Seems like these guys did some training already. But whose will pay off first.. we&#39;ll see.&#34;</font>

His folded arm stance remains. The teen shifts to stand the amber-haired boy.

<font color = white>&#34;Did yuh say Sarutobi?&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;I-I did, what&#39;s your name?&#34;</font> he&#39;d ask with a nervous smile.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">Laro</a> &#39;s luck did run out, as she finally managed to land an attack. And it was quite a strong one, as she managed to hit him right into his sternum with a rather powerful punch. It knocked the air out of him, causing him to hunch over a bit, sustaining rather heavy injury.

As he held his stomach, it was quite evident, one of those would probably put him out of the commission.

He could probably land a few more hits on her but would it be enough? Probably not.

<font color = white>&#34;I-I can&#39;t breath. &#34;</font>

For a moment, Sakuya thinks she can detect a wince in the dancer&#39;s eyes, a subtle hint that this unusual flexibility comes at a cost.

Intrigued, a thought crosses Sakuya&#39;s mind: this girl might be just as eccentric as she is. Feeling a newfound sense of kinship, she can&#39;t help but feel that a friendship between them could be equally intriguing and enriching.

Taking a step closer, Sakuya smiles and extends her hand in a friendly gesture. <font color = white>&#34;You know, we might have more in common than we thought. Would you like to be friends? <br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#c0c0c0"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=74809c42ff8fd92129f99d95b010d85cf0f30a109cd65c4f0f33789be1ab9447 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #c0c0c0;">The dead eyed teen</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#c0c0c0"><font color = white> So it was an over reaction?</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#3366cc"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">Laro</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#3366cc"><font color = white> Do we have a medic-nin nearby?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">Kaguya, Kamiya</a> let her finger snap back. <font color = white>&#34;Sure, Sakuy--&#34;</font> Kamiya stopped mid sentence, certain she had heard another unlucky soul who wanted to receive a punch. The feeling vanished after a moment. Her finger is held with her other hand, and its discolored, now-- significantly redder than the others, a little swollen. It was hardly a free action as evidenced by this cost.

<font color = white>&#34;It hurts, but it isn&#39;t broken.&#34;</font> She said, to the intense youngster. <font color = white>&#34;You can&#39;t break my bones.&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> gave a long stare- A long confused, judgemental stare before mentally facepalming.

<font color = white>&#34;Her abilities are probably like Lord Hokage, a Kaguya... They manipulate bone.&#34;</font> A smirk came to his face, he found it funny people hadn&#39;t heard stories of the Leader of the Village. Though on a second glance... They could manipulate Bones... but the fleshy parts were still damaged.

<font color = white>&#34;Though, youf pain tolerance must be insane since you damage the flashy bits...&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> OOCs<font color = white>: (*your Typo 2/2 may as well aim for the moon in typos.)</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama asks:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Can Kamiya manipulate my bones too?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#c0c0c0"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=74809c42ff8fd92129f99d95b010d85cf0f30a109cd65c4f0f33789be1ab9447 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #c0c0c0;">The dead eyed teen</a> asks:</b><span style="color:#c0c0c0"><font color = white>  You realized if they&#39;re okay then you shouldn&#39;t over react, right?</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc99ff"><font color = white> I would assume so.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#996633>Senju, Shishorama OOCs<font color = white>: (question, Kamiya</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">Kaguya, Kamiya</a> grinned at the Uchiha on the end of the line. She approached the boy, and held  her swollen index finger out. There&#39;s a look of incredible focus. She grunted, and huffed, and puffed, the obvious spice of pain in her inflection as a -hole- began to open at the end of her finger, and a pure, white finger bone began to poke out. It&#39;s clear this is taking an exhaustive amount of effort as her entire body is shaking.

It was revolting; unsettling.

<font color = white>&#34;Pull my finger.&#34;</font> Urged a strained voice.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font size=-4><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">Kaguya, Kamiya</a> OOCs<font color = white>: [yes]</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Are you a male or female? I&#39;m not sure what to call you!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">Laro</a> couldn&#39;t tell if she was talking to him or to the sable-haired youth next to him. Either way the request was rather weird. Kamiya wanted her finger to be pulled, while it seemed the bone was starting to protrude through the actual finger.

<font color = white>&#34;Uh-huh. &#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc99ff><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e3a9836492142a47018fb7ee3f6d754f5583376dc24239dd1e63ed28b36eb127 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc99ff;">Uchiha, Kohaku</a> would blink for a moment, though in his morbid curiousity he&#39;d absolutely do so. He wondered if that bone was in-fact coming out of that gory hole Kamiya&#39;s body seem to make. The Uchiha heard stories of the bones tearing through skin of both user and foe, this was far more clean than anticipated. However there was a strangeness to it when seeing something like this first hand.

The weird part was seeing how white the bone was despite it travelling through fleshm he expected them stained red, really.

<font color = white>&#34;Gnarly.&#34;</font> It was the only wword he could think of while doing this.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#b24a55><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=353e3f61154579756ccb0358ccd5c7c725bcdac2e6ef11cc728d031650c5693d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #b24a55;">Kaguya, Kamiya</a> clenched her jaw as he pulled an entire digit out. The hole closed, and rather than some gelatenous, boneless finger like one woudl expect, Kamiya seemed no worse for wear than before. There wasn&#39;t even a sign that she&#39;d just opened and inch wide hole in her flesh. The pain was real, but there were not lasting effects. 

She took the finger from him and wagged it in his face, the digit bouncing and bending at each knuckle. 

<font color = white>&#34;And now I can use this like a dagger!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">Laro</a> carefully observed the whole thing. The word &#39;gnarly&#39; described it well. But the boy got so invested into the process that he could see every little detail. And this, well, this had undesired results.

Dark haired boy immediately covered his mouth.

<font color = white>&#34;Oh I think I&#39;m gonna be sick. &#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> ---</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>Senju, Shishorama stared at the finger, dumbfounded. <font color = white>&#34;Are you stupid?&#34;</font></font></font></font>

He proceeded to mentally choose all of the above.

<font color = white>&#34;Eeeehww, but awesome. That&#39;s taking &#39;pointer finger&#39; very literally.&#34;</font> Making fun of the situation rather than keeling over sick, though he really had no idea how to react and fell back on humour as a coping mechanism.</font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Sure, I still got some more money from the bounty. What should we get this time Kumirama?&#34;</font> Thankfully, as a street stall of sorts, this place&#39;s prices were rather cheap, and the food quality was still great.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#ceb773><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=103da8e3cda99a00810f69447bb15d229745425c1db475f0e580fd56537f4ab8 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #ceb773;">Hanako</a> flops over the guard rail, entirely lacking in grace, and sploshed into the river. 

A minute later, she emerged, blowing on the recovered bill, trying and failing to air-dry it. A soggy set of sandal-prints were left in her trail as she made her way back to Position A! Lurking beneath the street light. 

Drenched, but the grin she wore says she's elated by her mission accomplished. </font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Hey Chef, serve these over here, please!&#34;</font> Sliding the paper to the cook, he just waited a little bit before food started being served, each one with a smell more appetizing than the one before it.</font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#a06d87"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=7026d78d56a1fe983d2984f627d0b08bc99cdeb69fb899b3c7af8c72ade0049d style = "text-decoration: none; color: #a06d87;">Senju, Kumirama</a> yells:</b><span style="color:#a06d87"><font color = white> I won it!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Yeah, she has an addiction!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#66ff99><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Akiri, Komo</a> looked at the crowd. Ignoring all the other statements being said.

<font color = white>&#34;Kumirama, I need you to come with me.&#34;</font> She eerily smiles.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> -</font></font></font></span></span>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#3366cc><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=e438cfb9824a017116d6dd7cba70c1a209d657a424c4c1b23c9de437e4656094 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #3366cc;">Laro</a> puts down the food as he slowly turns around.

<font color = white>&#34;Uh-huh, busted big time. &#34;</font> - he&#39;d mumble under his breath. But then it hit him. They were all noble clans so it would probably look quite bad on them, whatever it was. Him? He was nothing special. 

So he decided to step forward.

<font color = white>&#34;Miss Chuunin, it was me. It wasn&#39;t Kumirama. &#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;O-oh boy.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<font color = white>&#34;Back to my food it is then. &#34;</font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>Senju, Shishorama released her sister with a smile. <font color = white>&#34;Just kidding. You&#39;ll be fine.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>Senju, Shishorama winds her fist back and throws haymakers! Her form was absolutely abysmal.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#cc9900"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">Senju, Akitaru</a> says:</b><span style="color:#cc9900"><font color = white> . . . .</font></font></font></span></span>

<font color = white>&#34;Not the best, but if it gets the job done. It&#39;s done.&#34;</font></font></font></font>

<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Akiri, Komo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Not to mention they are wild, leaving you opened after throwing them out.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#cc9900><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=ddb1a06d8071a5e608470f59d3b62e03ae10075fe6b393e0338ed5ef61682b43 style = "text-decoration: none; color: #cc9900;">Senju, Akitaru</a> shrugged, as the thought of a spar ending due to such a sloppy display made him inwardly cringe. 

<font color = white>&#34;Whom are you? Whom did you defeat?&#34;</font>

A black notebook is produced from seemingly nowhere.</font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama says:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Maybe that&#39;s why I got his so much.~</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Akiri, Komo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Jabs are quick, if they land they give your body a sense of range.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><font color = white><font color=#996633>Senju, Shishorama never missed an opportunity to shout her name to the Heavens above.

<font color = white>&#34;I AM -THE- SENJU, SHISHORAMA! I DEFEATED....LARO!&#34;</font></font></font></font>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#66ff99"><a href=?src=[0x30000df];action=name;character=5098d245aa911c02a50e276087c0b4a9c96ab5af7243280a41a43da0f13611af style = "text-decoration: none; color: #66ff99;">Akiri, Komo</a> says:</b><span style="color:#66ff99"><font color = white> Laro must be quite good at taking punches.</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> He was fast! Agile!</font></font></font></span></span>
<br><font size=-3><b><span style="color:#996633">Senju, Shishorama yells:</b><span style="color:#996633"><font color = white> Nope, I beat him in one hit!</font></font></font></span></span>
